sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MatDialogRef } from '@angular/material/dialog'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-bill-dialog', templateUrl: './add-bill-dialog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-bill-dialog.component.scss'] }) export class AddBillDialogComponent { bill = { type: 'regular', name: '', amount: null as number | null, dueDate: null as Date | null, autoDueDate: false, category: '', monthlyPayment: null as number | null, noMonthlyPayment: false, loanDirection: 'give', // 'give' or 'take' loaner: '', borrower: '' }; constructor(private dialogRef: MatDialogRef) {} close(): void { this.dialogRef.close(); } addBill(): void { if (this.bill.autoDueDate && this.calculatedDueDate) { this.bill.dueDate = this.calculatedDueDate; } this.dialogRef.close(this.bill); } get installmentInfo(): string { if ( ['regular', 'credit'].includes(this.bill.type) && this.bill.amount !== null && this.bill.monthlyPayment !== null && this.bill.amount > 0 && this.bill.monthlyPayment > 0 && !this.bill.noMonthlyPayment ) { const totalMonths = Math.ceil(this.bill.amount / this.bill.monthlyPayment); return `0 of ${totalMonths} installments`; } return ''; } get calculatedInstallments(): number | null { if ( this.bill.amount !== null && this.bill.monthlyPayment !== null && !this.bill.noMonthlyPayment && this.bill.amount > 0 && this.bill.monthlyPayment > 0 ) { return Math.ceil(this.bill.amount / this.bill.monthlyPayment); } return null; } get calculatedDueDate(): Date | null { if (this.bill.autoDueDate && this.calculatedInstallments) { const due = new Date(); due.setMonth(due.getMonth() + this.calculatedInstallments); return due; } return null; } }

Add New Bill

Bill Type Regular Bill Credit Card Personal Loan Name Amount Monthly Payment Not Applicable (No Monthly Payment)
I Gave a Loan I Took a Loan
Loaner Name Borrower Name Due Date Auto-calculate due date from monthly payment

🔁 Repeats monthly for {{ calculatedInstallments }} months

📅 Estimated completion: {{ calculatedDueDate | date: 'longDate' }}
